name: Rocket Fist (itch) (computer_fox)
description:
The moon has wronged you for the last time. 

It's time to take control of your rocket powered fist and give it a good wallop!

Take care to dodge the hordes of UFOs and shooting stars flying past, your fist may be rocket powered but it's also made out of glass!

Controls:

Arrow keys: control the rocket

Escape: pause/quits on mission over screen

Enter: select/returns to menu on mission over screen

This was a silly game idea i had years ago. stumbled across some assets for it recently and decided to finish it. In the process I learned a new game framework (trivial-gamekit). This is my first game I've made without using some pre-made engine like Unity/Godot and also my first game made with lisp. It was a pretty fun little experiment and I had a good time making it.
